DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate two different placebo intrauterine systems, placebo FR01 and FR20 with different types of inserters, for wearing comfort, insertion/removal ease and pain compared to a placebo T-frame intrauterine system.
DOC.brief_title: FR01 and FR20 IUS (Intrauterine System) Wearing Study
DOC.criteria: Healthy Female subject Age 1840 years (inclusive) History of regular cyclic menstrual periods at baseline (cycle length 21 to 35 days) Women using any COC (combined oral contraceptive) for contraception with a monthly regimen before the study entry. Confirmed uterine sound depth of 6 to 10 cm Pregnancy or lactation Sterilized Nulliparous Congenital or acquired uterine anomaly Vaginal or cesarean delivery within 8 weeks prior to insertion
